subject: Re: [junit] verify new instance creation of an Object
msgSnippet: ... What do you mean? `new` creates a new object; Java says so, and presumably you re not in the business of testing the JVM. -- Chris sequer Dollin A rock
messageBody:
On Tuesday 06 June 2006 16:15, Kamal Ahmed wrote:
> Hi,
> How can we test if a "new" instance of an object of a certain user defined
> type is created? e.g.
>
> reqFieldTypes = new ArrayList<FieldType>(fieldTypes.length);

What do you mean?

`new` creates a new object; Java says so, and presumably you're not
in the business of testing the JVM.

--
Chris "sequer" Dollin
A rock is not a fact. A rock is a rock.
